info.description: Update Crebit Interest condition for Transaction / Summary / Currency Summary accounts
info.title: Credit Interest Conditions APIs

post.description: Update Crebit Interest condition for Summary accounts

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.description: Update Crebit Interest condition for Currency Summary Account accounts

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.description: Update Crebit Interest condition for Transaction Account accounts

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

partyIds.description: It is an unique identifier of a customer or party

partyId.description: It is an unique identifier of a customer or party

arrangmentId.description: It is the unique identifier of an arrangement account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

fixed.description: Indicates the fixed interest rate applied to an account

minMaxRate.description: Indicates whether minimum and maximum rate defined for the tier

maxRate.description: Indicates the maximum/minimum rate of a tier for interest/charge calculation

effectiveRate.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation/based on basic or Periodic index value

upTo.description: indicates the date upto which rate was applicable

negativeRate.description: Indicates the negative interest rate applied to an account

marginOperation.description: Indicates the type of operators to adjust the MARGIN.RATE of an interest for an account(Add/Subtract/Mutiply)

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

value.description: The value of the field on which the Alert criteria is based

linkedArrangement.description: The account which is linked for calculating interest that should be applied to this account

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
